name: The Statecheck
description:
Hi there!

I've recently started my adventure with game developing and this is my first finished project.

It's pretty simple to play - you only use arrows and space. Game contains three types of enemies - basic, stronger and bosses. And from there it's up to you and your skill.

Purpose of this game is pretty straightforward - chill, listen to some synthwave and destroy spaceships like it's the 90's and you're at the local arcade. ;)

Hope you'll enjoy it! ;)
